page.title: 08A LARGE HOUSE IN CHELTENHAM
page.content: THE HOUSE I LIVE IN IS VERY LARGE.IT HAS THIRTY NINE ROOMS WHERE AS MOST HOUSES HAVE SEVEN OR EIGHT ROOMS.THE SECOND TO TOP FLOOR IS USED BY STUDENTS.IN THE HOUSE THERE ARE SIX BATHROOM AND SEVEN TOILETS.THE EARL OF ESSEX USED TO LIVE IN OUR HOUSE.AFTER THAT IT WAS SOLD TO A GENERAL IN THE FIRST WORLD WAR AND THE SECOND WORLD WAR.THEN AGAIN IT WAS SOLD TO A LADY WHO HAD MANY MANY PETS.SEVERAL OF THE PETS ARE BURIED IN THE GARDEN,NAMELY TWO CATS,ONE DOG AND A HORSE. EVENTUALLY THE HOUSE WAS SOLD AGAIN AND FINALLY IN 1984 WE BOUGHT IT.MY DAD HAS SPENT A LOT OF MONEY ON PAINT AND WALLPAPER AND HAS SPENT A GREAT DEAL OF TIME RENOVATING THE HOUSE AND BRINGING IT UP TO MODERN STANDARDS. SO YOU SEE THE HOUSE I LIVE IN HAS QUITE AN INTERESTING HISTORY.
